title: How to Cancel Cash App Payment

steps.title: Open Cash App.
steps.content: Open Cash App. Cash App is available to use on iPhone or Android .

steps.title: Click the Activity tab.
steps.content: Click the Activity tab. This will be indicated by the clock icon on the top right. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Select the payment you want to cancel.
steps.content: Select the payment you want to cancel. You will be able to see the sender, the amount, and the time of payment. This will pull up a new window with more information.

steps.title: Click ••• .
steps.content: Click ••• . This will open the options regarding the payment.

steps.title: Click Refund.
steps.content: Click Refund .

steps.title: Click OK.
steps.content: Click OK . This will send the payment back to the sender.

steps.title: Open Cash App.
steps.content: Open Cash App.

steps.title: Click the Activity tab.
steps.content: Click the Activity tab. This will be indicated by the clock icon on the top right.

steps.title: Select the payment you want to cancel.
steps.content: Select the payment you want to cancel. You will be able to see the sender, the amount, and the time of the payment. This will pull up a new window with more information.

steps.title: Click ••• .
steps.content: Click ••• . This will open the options regarding the payment.

steps.title: Check for a "Cancel" option.
steps.content: Check for a "Cancel" option. In most cases, you won't see a Cancel option since Cash App payments are instant.

steps.title: If present, click Cancel.
steps.content: If present, click Cancel . This will cancel the transaction and return the money to your account.

steps.title: Open Cash App.
steps.content: Open Cash App.

steps.title: Click the Activity tab.
steps.content: Click the Activity tab. This will be indicated by the clock icon on the top right.

steps.title: Select the payment you want to cancel.
steps.content: Select the payment you want to cancel. You will be able to see the sender, the amount, and the time of the payment. This will pull up a new window with more information.

steps.title: Click ••• .
steps.content: Click ••• . This will open the options regarding the payment.

steps.title: Click Report an Issue.
steps.content: Click Report an Issue . [2] X Research source

steps.title: Select a reason.
steps.content: Select a reason. You can select I sent the wrong person money , I have an issue with goods or services I paid for , or I was scammed .

steps.title: Click Next.
steps.content: Click Next .

steps.title: Click Done.
steps.content: Click Done . Your request for a refund will be sent to the recipient. If they approve the refund, you will see it in the Activity tab on the top right.

steps.title: Contact the merchant.
steps.content: Contact the merchant. Before disputing any charges, contact the merchant/recipient to resolve the issue. If they do not respond or if you are unable to come to an agreement, you can move to the next step to contact Cash App . [3] X Research source

steps.title: Open Cash App.
steps.content: Open Cash App.

steps.title: Click the Activity tab on your home screen.
steps.content: Click the Activity tab on your home screen. This will be indicated by the clock icon in the top right.

steps.title: Select the transaction you want to dispute.
steps.content: Select the transaction you want to dispute.

steps.title: Click ••• .
steps.content: Click ••• . This will open the options regarding the payment.

steps.title: Click Need Help & Cash App Support.
steps.content: Click Need Help & Cash App Support .

steps.title: Click Dispute this Transaction.
steps.content: Click Dispute this Transaction . Cash App will take the steps to contact the merchant or recipient to investigate the dispute claim. You will be notified of updates throughout the process via email. The final decision will be made by the card network. If needed, you can view your Cash App history .
